author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Gamma ray bursts are the most powerful explosions in the universe. They are bright enough to outshine entire galaxies. If one hit Earth, it could destroy our ozone layer in seconds and trigger mass extinction.

#kurzgesagt 
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #GammaRayBurst #Astrophysics #Space

title: Invisible Extinction From Space – Gamma Ray Bursts

author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Can something really move faster than the speed of light?
Thanks to cosmic expansion, the answer is… kind of. Some galaxies move faster away from us than light itself. That's also why we’ll never reach 95% of all galaxies.

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science
